Title: Preserved in Amber
Description:
Take... this...

<The dying mantid struggles to outstretch his arm. In his mangled grasp rests a metal fork with two long, thin prongs and an ornately jeweled handle.>

Awaken... the Wind-Reaver...

It is the only way... to end the swarm.
ObjectivesText: Use the Klaxxi Tuning Fork on the Ancient Amber Chunk in the Terrace of Gurthan.

Objectives.Text: Klaxxi Tuning Fork used on Amber
